title: Ohio GOP senators won't give away Wexner donations amid Epstein probe
shortDescription: A growing number of Ohio politicians plan to donate campaign contributions from billionaire Les Wexner in lead-up to his testimony about Epstein ties.

title: Republican congressman says he has no confidence in Pam Bondi as AG
shortDescription: In a rare split within the GOP, Congressman Thomas Massie said on ABC's "This Week" that he has no confidence in Pam Bondi as Attorney General.

title: Trump’s MAGA Inc. has a whopping $300 million to spend on midterms
shortDescription: Trump’s super PAC, Maga Inc., has amassed over $300 million since his election, an unprecedented amount that will help Republicans in midterms.

title: White House ballroom renderings briefly posted, then removed
shortDescription: Renderings briefly posted Feb. 13 before being removed reveal the scale of a proposed 89,000-square-foot White House ballroom.

title: Are aliens 'real?' What Congress heard before Obama admission
shortDescription: Former President Barack Obama ignited a firestorm when he seemed to admit aliens were “real.” Congress has explored the topic of UAP, UFOs for years.

title: Anxious Trump feels impeachment heat, 9 months before midterms
shortDescription: He's not on the ballot, but President Trump's rating will matter in November. Kitchen-table angst, too. Three key numbers give clues to what's ahead.

title: Trump says Board of Peace members pledged over $5 billion for Gaza
shortDescription: Trump said Board of Peace member states will announce a pledge of more than $5 billion for reconstruction and humanitarian efforts in Gaza.

title: 'Be practical.' Obama urges Democrats to change approach on homelessness
shortDescription: Obama discussed internal frictions between moderate and progressive Democrats on the issue of homelessness in an interview.

title: 'Very serious.' Denmark, Greenland fear Trump still wants to take control
shortDescription: The leaders of Denmark and Greenland do not think their Trump crisis has ended despite the start of formal talks with the White House.

title: Barack Obama responds to controversial Trump post
shortDescription: Barack Obama said in an interview that a video President Trump posted that depicted Barack and Michelle Obama as apes was part of a "clown show."

title: 'Clown show': Barack Obama responds to Trump post of Obamas as apes
shortDescription: Former President Barack Obama said a video President Donald Trump posted depicting Obama and his wife as apes was part of a shameless "clown show."

title: Trump says regime change 'would be the best thing' in Iran
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said regime change in Iran would be "the best thing," as U.S. officials seek deal with Iran over nuclear program.
